verses.name: Mark 12:20
verses.text: Now there were seven brethren: and the first took a wife, and dying left no seed.

verses.name: Mark 12:21
verses.text: And the second took her, and died, neither left he any seed: and the third likewise.

verses.name: Mark 12:22
verses.text: And the seven had her, and left no seed: last of all the woman died also.

verses.name: Mark 12:23
verses.text: In the resurrection therefore, when they shall rise, whose wife shall she be of them? for the seven had her to wife.

verses.name: Mark 12:24
verses.text: And Jesus answering said unto them, Do ye not therefore err, because ye know not the scriptures, neither the power of God?
